about.title: About Geot√≠pico
about.subtitle: Discovering Manta's local gastronomy
about.mission_1: Geot√≠pico was born with the mission of promoting and highlighting the rich gastronomy of Manta, helping both tourists and locals discover the best restaurants and typical dishes of the region.
about.mission_2: We want to value Manabita culinary culture, making it easier to access geolocated information about restaurants and their specialties.
about.feature_map_desc: Explore restaurants on an interactive map that lets you see options near your location.
about.feature_filters_desc: Find exactly what you are looking for with filters by specialty, price range, and rating.
about.feature_gastronomy_desc: Discover typical Manabita dishes and the best restaurants to enjoy local cuisine.
about.feature_responsive_desc: Access Geot√≠pico from any device, with an experience optimized for mobiles and tablets.
about.sources_desc: Geot√≠pico uses data from OpenStreetMap, a collaborative platform of free and editable maps. We also complement this information with manually collected data to ensure the quality and relevance of our database.
about.contact_desc: Do you have suggestions, comments or want to add your restaurant? We would love to hear from you.
